ai-patthana22.2:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.2:0.3_0: Seeing for the sake of goodness, wholesome things,
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_0: Not unskillful qualities give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_1: Not by reason, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_2: Not with the cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_3: Not answering, or cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_4: Not unskillful qualities arise or cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_5: Knowing the cause or reason, without a reason, for the sake of unskillful qualities, or for the sake of good results.
ai-patthana22.2:1.1_6: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arises in someone who has not caused a condition for the sake of good things.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_1: Not by the Teaching, nor by cause, on reason,
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_2: Not by reason, it doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_3: Not skilled in loss, or cause or reasons.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_4: Not unskillful qualities arise or cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_5: Knowing the reason or cause; without a cause or condition; with no cause or reason, without a reason, because of what is contradicts cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.2:3.1_6: This is the section in brief.
